about_the_game:
A mighty Warlock has teleported from the Project Warlock retro shooter!

Warlock’s magical staff is well suited both for short and long distances, while his Harvester special ability fires four piercing rounds to smash enemies into a mush.



This new playable character for B.I.O.T.A. is available from the start as well as in your already saved games.

On the planet's surface, simply select Warlock as your hero to explore the underground facilities and eliminate mutated creatures.
detailed_description:
A mighty Warlock has teleported from the Project Warlock retro shooter!

Warlock’s magical staff is well suited both for short and long distances, while his Harvester special ability fires four piercing rounds to smash enemies into a mush.



This new playable character for B.I.O.T.A. is available from the start as well as in your already saved games.

On the planet's surface, simply select Warlock as your hero to explore the underground facilities and eliminate mutated creatures.

name: Warlock character for B.I.O.T.A.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 - 3570K or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 (Ivy Bridge) or higher
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated or dedicated compatible soundcard
  • Additional Notes: Required to play in default graphical settings (LO-FI) and 1080p

short_description: A mighty Warlock has teleported to B.I.O.T.A. from the Project Warlock retro shooter to smash monsters with its magical staff and unique combat ability. Get this new playable character for free!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Portuguese - Brazil, German
*languages with full audio support
